ygData.subject: Re: Chivtron Decisions
ygData.msgSnippet: Grounded sighed then spoke.  I have a suggestion.  We will hold a match of honour between Sarge and Aerotaur.  The winner will have the right to kill Deemos.

Grounded sighed then spoke.  "I have a suggestion.  We will hold a 
match of honour between Sarge and Aerotaur.  The winner will have the 
right to kill Deemos. Agree, and i will tell you the rules."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Sarge was angered by the words of Aerotaur.
> 
> Sarge: He took my entire army and had them killed. All 485 of them. 
I doubt you've lost more...
> 
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Rudra656@a... 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Saturday, June 30, 2001 1:37 PM
>   Subject: Re: Chivtron Decisions
> 
> 
>   ::Aerotaur::
>       "I'm sorry Grounded but Deemos has hurt us too many times for 
me to let 
>   him live.  This is all because I let him go the first time he 
attacked.  As 
>   for you Sarge, I have just as much reason to kill him.  In our 
last fight I 
>   lost an arm and a leg defending others.  I nearly died because 
there were 
>   bots in the battle that shouldn't have been there.  I couldn't 
care less 
>   about his lackeys.  Now then, let's get to the meeting so we can 
finish it 
>   and start planning our attack."  He stands tall glaring at Sarge.
> 
>    
>
